layout.name: Videodrome
layout.description:
Be Seen.
Designed for video bloggers, photographers, and artists. The focus is on your images.
layout.setup:
person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id)
subtitle = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle") title = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "title") title = person.full_name if title.blank?
Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "webmaster_email", "9041D4FC-D97F-44F0-BFF2-FC2B4D3F6270", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "site_copyright", "4454EFC0-EC3C-4C9D-8EF5-6F848E3B33D7", person.full_name) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_description", "F0E1D8A9-33B9-4605-B10F-831D2BB3D423", title+" #{subtitle}") Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("system", "meta_keywords", "1843B11F-EBA1-4B9A-A01F-F98A3E458FA8", title+" #{subtitle}") Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_editor_email", "89139210-E699-4D47-A656-B2F860D2015B", person.email) Roxiware::Param::Param.set_application_param("blog", "blog_title", "3D102055-8C9B-4838-90F7-2B3C7DB23A1D", title+" #{subtitle}")
layout.settings_form: <%= form_for :custom_settings, :url=> customize_layout_path(@layout.guid), :method=>"PUT" do |customize_form| custom_params = @layout.get_scheme_params(@layout_scheme).merge(@layout.custom_settings.h) content_tag(:ul, :class=>"tabs") do content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Backgrounds")) + content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Fonts & Colors")) end + content_tag(:div, :class=>"panes") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"background_pane") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("header_background_image"), :width=>1024, :height=>110, :id=>"header_background_image") + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("background_image"), :id=>"background_image", :width=>1920, :height=>1200) + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("body_background_image"), :id=>"body_background_image", :width=>1024, :height=>1200) end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"colors_pane") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"background_fields") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("header_background_color"), :id=>"header_background_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("body_background_color"), :id=>"body_background_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("background_color"), :id=>"background_color") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"title_fields") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("title_font"), :id=>"title_font") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("title_color"), :id=>"title_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("subtitle_font"), :id=>"subtitle_font") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("subtitle_color"), :id=>"subtitle_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("menu_text_color"), :id=>"menu_text_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("menu_text_selected_color"), :id=>"menu_text_selected_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("menu_background_color"), :id=>"menu_background_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("menu_background_hover_color"), :id=>"menu_background_hover_color") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"color_fields") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("text_color"), :id=>"text_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("link_color"), :id=>"link_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("link_hover_color"), :id=>"link_hover_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("post_text_color"), :id=>"post_text_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("post_link_color"), :id=>"post_link_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("post_link_hover_color"), :id=>"post_link_hover_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("text_alert_color"), :id=>"text_alert_color") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"color_fields") do custom_params.values.sort{|x,y| x.name <=> y.name}.collect do |param| param_field(customize_form, param, :id=>param.name) end.join("").html_safe end end end + button_tag("Save", :class=>"save_button", :id=>"save_button", :type=>"submit") end %>
